about_the_game:
THE DOWN BELOW is a short adventure horror fps inspired by titles such as Dusk, The Pony Factory, Half Life, System Shock 2, and other similar titles. The Down Below focuses on mystery and story-telling with some bloody combat. You'll face various different horrors as you explore the underground labyrinth of dark and mysterious experiments.

The Down Below features 4 distinctly interesting levels to explore, each with their own thick atmosphere. Fight your way through over 10 uniquely horrific enemies. Experience an immersive and interactive game world with detailed environments. There are over 30 items you can interact with such as ammo, food, and explosives you can find to continue exploring deeper, as well as plenty of physics based props that can be picked up and moved.

With your wits and your trusty lever action shotgun, uncover the mystery of the missing mercenaries and the grotesque experiments of a research team gone rogue.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features a lot of violence, blood, and gore. There are also story themes of peril and grotesque horrors.
